# Ash Vibez

> Agent guidance for creating and building Ash Framework applications.

This documentation is optimized for AI agents. Fetch the linked documents to get detailed instructions.

## Creating New Projects

- [New Project](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/ash_vibez/main/docs/new-project.md): Create a new Ash project using the Ash HQ installer or Igniter CLI

## Extensions & Packages

- [Extensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/ash_vibez/main/docs/extensions.md): Available Ash extensions and how to discover more

## Tools

- [Usage Rules](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/ash_vibez/main/docs/usage-rules.md): Install usage_rules to get package-author guidance for existing Ash projects
